articles.title: Husband from UK's first couple with Down's Syndrome to get married dies aged 62 from Covid - Daily Mail
articles.description: Tommy Pilling, 62, from Southend-on-Sea, Essex, lost his battle to coronavirus on January 1, leaving behind his doting wife Maryanne, 49, who says she is 'completely lost' without her love.
articles.content:
A man who made history with his wife as the UK's first couple with Down's Syndrome to marry has died from Covid-19 - just two weeks after contracting the virus. 
Tommy Pilling, 62, from Southend-on-… [+4885 chars]
